section.name: Introduction
section.p: The dependencies page lists all the jars that you will need to have in your classpath.
The class com.steadystate.css.parser.CSSOMParser is a good starting point for writing your first parser.

section.name: Processing the rules
section.p: The method getCssRules() offers all rules available.

section.name: Error handling
section.p: CSSParser error handling is based on org.w3c.css.sac.ErrorHandler and CSSParseException. You have to write your own implementation of the ErrorHandler interface and register it before start parsing.
